question: My boyfriend is a 35-year-old who is experiencing numbness from his knee down to his toes, which hurt.  The numbness switches sides.  He doesn't have insurance and is wondering what the problem could be.  He hasn't had any injuries and is concerned it may be diabetes, which his grandmother has.  He is a truck driver and mover so he is on his feet a lot.  He has been experiencing this periodic numbness for about a year.
title: Numbness in leg
